darkcurrent: Dark frame saturation time greater than 1 hour. Less than 0.1 electrons/second @ + 10C ambient.
ccdtype: ICX429AK Sony Exview interline CCD with low dark current and vertical anti-blooming.
size: 32 x 72mm black anodised aluminium barrel with 25 x 0.75mm 'C mount' thread at the CCD window end & input/output plugs at rear.
